lead_paragraph: JOSEPHSON--Cynthia, age 83, passed on June 30, 2014 in New York City. Cynthia was devoted to her family and was passionate about her many years spent in her beloved New York City. Beloved wife of the late Gabe and devoted mother to her four children, Mark, Seth, David and Julie and mother-in-law to Mike, Susan, Jeanne and Debra. Cherished grandmother to her 10 granddaughters, Nicole, Samantha, Olivia, Cara, Anna, Rachel, Isabella, Sophia, Nina and Ruby. Loving sister of Leonora Schaefer. Services Thursday, July 3rd, 11:30am at "The Riverside" 76th Street and Amsterdam Ave. Donations may be made to Doctors Without Borders.
